meta_description: Set within a residential neighborhood, the Menil Collection invites visitors to explore its art buildings and green spaces. Admission is always free.
hours_text:
# 

_Plan_ Your Visit

MUSEUM HOURS

## Wednesday–Sunday

11 a.m.–7 p.m.  Closed Mondays and Tuesdays.  Always free. 

The Menil Collection, a public art museum located in the heart of Houston, welcomes visitors to explore a campus of art buildings and green spaces set within a residential neighborhood. Guided by founders John and Dominique de Menil’s belief that art is essential to the human experience, the museum is always free and open to all. In the Menil's intimately scaled, naturally lit galleries, visitors are invited to unplug and engage with the works on view. 

## Explore _Campus_

Learn more

[ ](https://www.menil.org/campus)

### Buildings

Main Building 

1533 Sul Ross Street 

Menil Drawing Institute 

1412 W Main Street 

Cy Twombly Gallery 

1501 Branard Street 

Richmond Hall 

1500 Richmond Avenue 

Menil Bookstore 

1520 Sul Ross Street 

### Menil Bookstore

Browse a selection of Menil publications and special merchandise. Every purchase supports the museum. 

[ Shop ](https://bookstore.menil.org/)

### Arriving at the Menil

PARKING 

1515 West Alabama Street and next to Richmond Hall at 1500 Richmond Avenue. Additionally, street parking is available. 

BIKE RACKS 

1515 West Alabama Street, behind the Cy Twombly Gallery, and alongside 1515 Branard Street. 

BUS STOPS 

METRO bus stops can be found along Richmond Avenue near Loretto Street and Mandell Street. Other nearby stops are located along Montrose Boulevard near Colquitt Street and Branard Street. ...

collections_text:
## 

Discover a space for creativity and reflection. 

## 

Immerse yourself in a neighborhood of art. 

# 

_Welcome_ to The Menil Collection

Set within a residential neighborhood, the Menil Collection invites visitors to explore its art buildings and green spaces. Admission is always free. 

#### Plan Your Visit

[ ](https://www.menil.org/visit)

#### Explore Campus

[ ](https://www.menil.org/campus)

### Menil by Moonlight on February 5

Menil members are invited to a special celebratory evening of festive cocktails, hors d'oeuvres, and live music. 

[ Learn More ](https://www.menil.org/events/menil-by-moonlight)

### On View

[ See all ](https://www.menil.org/exhibitions)

#### Robert Rauschenberg: Fabric Works of the 1970s

Main Building 

[ ](https://www.menil.org/exhibition/robert-rauschenberg-fabric-works-of-the-1970s)

#### Photography from The Menil Collection: Curated by Wendy Watriss

Main Building 

[ ](https://www.menil.org/exhibition/photography-from-the-menil-collection-curated-by-wendy-watriss)

#### Lines of Resolution: Drawing at the Advent of Television and Video

Menil Drawing Institute 

[ ](https://www.menil.org/exhibition/lines-of-resolution-drawing-at-the-advent-of-television-and-video)

#### Wall Drawing Series: Gladys Nilsson

Menil Drawing Institute 

[ ](https://www.menil.org/exhibition/wall-drawing-series-gladys-nilsson)

#### Modern and Contemporary

Main Building 

[ ](https://www.menil.org/exhibition/modern-and-contemporary)
